subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: What are the chances that in a few years Prince Fielder could be joined by Rickie Weeks, J. J. Hardy and Ryan Braun in the National League infield for the All-Star Game?
snippet: What are the chances that in a few years Prince Fielder could be joined by Rickie Weeks, J. J. Hardy and Ryan Braun in the National League infield for the All-Star Game?
